Indian Economy.title: AI can lift productivity, reshape the economy and still leave investors in the red
Indian Economy.summary: The AI boom could reshape the economy and boost productivity, but investors are playing a risky game. Even if an AI bubble bursts, it’s unlikely to spark a 2008-style meltdown—though equity losses could still be massive, leaving investors with plenty to worry…

Stock Market.title: Rupee rises 10 paise to close at 88.69 against US dollar
